name: 2021 4th International Conference on Electronics, Communications and Control Engineering（ICECC 2021）
content: Proceedings： Accepted papers of ICECC 2021 (after proper registration and presentation) will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-8912-9), which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc.
